NK040(thi)013:1: // ma cig khros ma nag mo'i dur khrod bskul pa bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)013:2: ma 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol nas //
NK040(thi)013:3: u tsa la yi dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)013:4: ri bo thams cad rus pa'i ri //
NK040(thi)013:5: rtsi shing thams cad mda' dang mdung //
NK040(thi)013:6: chu klung thams cad khrag dang rnag /
NK040(thi)013:7: sgra skad thams cad mkha' 'gro'i sgra //
NK040(thi)013:8: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad ya nga ba //
NK040(thi)013:9: khro bcu rgyu ba mi nus shing //
NK040(thi)013:10: phyag na rdo rje 'jig pa'i sa //
NK040(thi)013:11: u tsa la yi dur khrod nas //
NK040(thi)013:12: ma cig khros ma nag mo bzhengs su gsol //
NK040(thi)013:13: ma cig khros ma nag mo bzhengs tsa na //
NK040(thi)013:14: sku mdog nag mo 'jigs pa'i gzi mdangs can //
NK040(thi)013:15: phyag g.yas pas zhing chen g.yang gzhi sdeb //
NK040(thi)013:16: brdab pas snang srid lha 'dre dbang du bsdud //
NK040(thi)013:17: phyag g.yon pas mi rkang gling bu 'bud //
NK040(thi)013:18: 'bud pas lha srin sde brgyad dmyal thag chod //
NK040(thi)013:19: spyan g.yas pas nyi ma gyen la gzigs //
NK040(thi)013:20: steng tshangs sogs lha rnams dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)013:21: spyan g.yon pas zla ba thur du gzigs //
NK040(thi)013:22: 'og grul bum klu rnams dbang du bsdud //
NK040(thi)013:23: zhabs gnyis krig krig sa la brdab //
NK040(thi)013:24: 'jig rten khams rnams g.yo bar byed //
NK040(thi)013:25: spyi gtsug phag zhal mkha' la ngur //
NK040(thi)013:26: ngur ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dbang du bsdud //
NK040(thi)013:27: ma dbang bsdud mkha' 'gro mthu ma chung //
NK040(thi)013:28: dbang sdud mkha' 'gro rtsal ma zhan //
NK040(thi)013:29: rigs bzhi mkha' 'gro mthu ma chung //
NK040(thi)013:30: rigs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro rtsal ma zhan //
NK040(thi)013:31: nam mkha'i sprin tshogs bzhin du 'dus la shog /
NK040(thi)013:32: bar snang char pa bzhin du phob la shog /
NK040(thi)013:33: sa gzhi rlung dmar bzhin du 'tshubs la shog /
NK040(thi)013:37: ma thugs ka las ni 'od zer 'gyed //
NK040(thi)013:38: zhing chen g.yang gzhi shar du g.yugs //
NK040(thi)013:40: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK040(thi)013:41: shar phyogs pho gdon rgyal po dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)013:42: mo gdon srin mo dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)013:43: gnyan sa'i lha 'dre dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)013:44: khyi dmar rgyal 'gong gnas gdon lus gdon za 'dre
NK040(thi)013:45: shi gshed srog gcod dbug len gson bdud gshin lcags
NK040(thi)013:46: god 'dre god sri dbang du bgab 'dre bgab sri
NK040(thi)013:47: na tsha na 'dre dbang che 'dre chung sri dbang
NK040(thi)013:48: du bsdus // dbang du bsdus la zil gyis gnon //
